title: Particle motion, given velocity function part - d

content.question: A second particle moves along the x-axis with position given by x2(t) = t2 − t for 0 ≤ t ≤ 3.5. At what time t are the two particles moving with the same velocity? -

frqParts.text: A second particle moves along the x-axis with position given by x2(t) = t2 − t for 0 ≤ t ≤ 3.5. At what time t are the two particles moving with the same velocity? -

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
